lyrics:
10 contributorslook at me lyricsverse 1
i would bet my life like i bet my heart
that you were the one baby
ive never been so sure of anything before
youre drivin my heart crazy

prechorus 1
i cant hold out i cant hold back now
like ive done before

chorus
darling look at me
ive fallen like a fool for you
darling cant you see
id do anything you want me to
i tell myself im in too deep
then i fall a little farther
every time you look at me

verse 2
how do you do that babe
make me feel like im the only girl alive for you
i dont know what it is that makes me fall like this
first time in your arms i knew

prechorus 2
the way you held me i knew that this could be
what ive been waiting to find
see carrie underwood liveget tickets as low as 94you might also likechorus
darling look at me
ive fallen like a fool for you
darling cant you see
id do anything you want me to
i tell myself im getting in too deep
then i fall a little farther
every time you look at me

outro
every time you look at meembed
